sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About Me!

This is all about me! I am a Junior majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Computer Information Systems. My favorite hobbies include skiing, playing video games, hiking, being involved in my community, and traveling. I hope to graduate in the Spring of 2024 with a B.S. Degree but I am unsure how I would like to use it yet. I am currently looking into having internships next spring but it is still a long time away but I am still stressing.
